description: Quotient cycle lengths in continued fraction expansion of Sqrt(n^2+4).
example: For even numbers 2, for odds 5 is the length of cycles: n=96,97 the integer parts and cycles are: [96],[48,192]] and [97],[48, 1, 1, 48, 194] resp. Inside cycles Floor[n/2],1,1 and 2n arise.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 27 2001
